lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur have reached agreement with the FA to host Champions League games at Wembley next season with an option to use the national stadium for all matches in the 2017-18 campaign while they are building a new ground.

headline.print_headline: Spurs to Play Champions League Matches at Wembley
headline.main: Spurs to Play Champions League Matches at Wembley

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur have reached agreement with the FA to host Champions League games at Wembley next season with an option to use the national stadium for all matches in the 2017-18 campaign while they are building a new ground....
